H0.text: In which contact sport do two rikishi compete inside a dohyo . Judo

H1.text: In which contact sport do two rikishi compete inside a dohyo . Karate

H2.text: In which contact sport do two rikishi compete inside a dohyo . Kendo

H3.text: In which contact sport do two rikishi compete inside a dohyo . 相撲

A4.text: The dohyō is the space in which a sumo wrestling bout occurs.
